title: 308: Discussing Grief & Unexpected Loss w/ Elyse Dehlbom
itunes:title: 308: Discussing Grief & Unexpected Loss w/ Elyse Dehlbom
description:
(CW: conversations about death) Today The Broads are joined by the amazing Elyse Dehlbom (Bachelor Season 23)! First they chat about Elyse’s time on Colton’s Bachelor season, why she left, and the wild and mysterious way she got cast for the show! Then they dive into an open and vulnerable discussion about grief and sudden loss. Elyse talks about her personal experience with grief, things she’s learned, what she would do differently, how to be a friend to someone who has dealt with an unexpected loss, and more. 

ELYSE DEHLBOM:

Follow her at: https://www.instagram.com/elysemichelle_mua/

“Sarah’s Closet” nonprofit Facebook group here: https://m.facebook.com/groups/207764599395820/

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
